doc:
A. J. Brown https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A._J._Brown 0 Alfred John Brown (14 September 1897 – 29 January 1978) was an English theatre, film and television actor. He appeared in many British television series and films, which include The Adventures of Robin Hood, Dixon of Dock Green, Bomb in the High Street, The Trials of Oscar Wilde, Lord Jim, Out of the Unknown, Emergency – Ward 10, The Avengers, Hands of the Ripper and others.He was originally supposed to play The Controller in the serial "The Macra Terror" in Doctor Who. Alfred_John_Brown ( 14_September_1897 – 29_January_1978 ) was an_English_theatre_,_film_and_television_actor . He appeared in many_British_television_series_and_films , which include The_Adventures of Robin_Hood , Dixon of Dock_Green , Bomb in the_High_Street , The_Trials of Oscar_Wilde , Lord_Jim , Out of the_Unknown_,_Emergency – Ward_10 , The_Avengers , Hands of the_Ripper_and_others.He was_originally_supposed_to_play The_Controller in the_serial " The_Macra_Terror " in Doctor Who .
